mapper.select: SELECT b.brand_Id, B.brand_Name, B.brand_Like, B.brand_Summary, B.brand_Explaination, BI.brand_Img_Src FROM BRAND B JOIN BRAND_IMG BI ON B.brand_Id = BI.brand_Id WHERE B.brand_Id = #{brandId }

SELECT * FROM productcontainer2 WHERE brand_Id = #{brandId}
AND (category_Large_Id IN ('0001', '0002', '0004'))
AND category_Large_Id = '0001'
AND category_Large_Id = '0002'
AND category_Large_Id = '0004'
ORDER BY product_Display_Like DESC
ORDER BY product_Reg DESC
ORDER BY ordercnt DESC
ORDER BY ProductPrice ASC
ORDER BY (minprice - afterprice) / minprice * 100 DESC

SELECT ROWNUM, t.* FROM ( SELECT PD.product_Display_Name, PDI.product_Display_Src, PD.product_Display_Like, P.Product_Price FROM Product_Display PD JOIN PRODUCT P ON PD.product_Display_Id = P.product_Display_Id JOIN product_Display_Img PDI ON PD.product_Display_Id = PDI.Product_Display_ID WHERE PD.BRAND_ID = #{brandId} ORDER BY PD.Product_Display_Like DESC ) t WHERE ROWNUM < 5

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT r.review_Id, pd.brand_id, pdi.product_Display_Src, r.review_Like, r.review_Grade, r.review_Content, pd.product_Display_Id FROM Product_Display pd JOIN product_Display_IMG pdi ON pd.product_Display_Id = pdi.product_Display_Id JOIN review r ON pd.product_Display_Id = r.product_Display_Id WHERE pd.brand_Id = #{brandId} ORDER BY r.review_Like DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 3
